title: How to learn NextJs
content:
How to Learn Next.js – The Ultimate Guide for Beginners

🔹 What is Next.js?

Next.js is a powerful React framework developed by Vercel. It enables developers to build fast, SEO-friendly, and scalable web applications using features like:

  • ⚡ Server-Side Rendering (SSR)
  • 🧱 Static Site Generation (SSG)
  • 🌀 API Routes
  • 📦 Built-in routing system
  • 📁 File-based architecture

🔹 Why Learn Next.js?

  • ✅ Better performance and SEO than traditional React apps
  • ✅ Easy deployment with Vercel
  • ✅ Supports full-stack development
  • ✅ Automatic code splitting and optimization

🔹 Getting Started with Next.js

  1. Install it using npm or yarn:
    npx create-next-app@latest my-app
  2. Navigate to your project: cd my-app
  3. Start development server: npm run dev

🔹 Core Concepts

  • Pages & Routing: Each file inside the /pages folder becomes a route.
  • Data Fetching: Use getStaticProps, getServerSideProps, and getStaticPaths.
  • API Routes: Create backend functions inside /pages/api.
  • Image Optimization: Built-in <Image /> component.

🔹 Example Code

 // pages/index.js export default function Home() { return <h1>Welcome to Next.js!</h1>; }

🔹 Useful Learning Resources

  • Next.js Official Tutorial
  • React Docs (Updated)
  • Vercel Deployment Guides

🚀 Tip: Start by converting an existing React app into a Next.js app to practice.

Happy Building with Next.js! 🧑‍💻
